page.title: 16THE FLEET NEWS-A LOCAL PAPER
page.content: The{Fleet News}is sold on Tuesday and Friday. The paper includes local stories, advertisements, a sport's page, television viewing and items for sale. Some of the news is from Aldershot and other places. They have printed 5767 editions since it started and it costs 16p. {SUMMARY}OF NEWS ON 5 JULY {German schoolchildren}have been visiting Fleet; Fleet pupils will visit Germany, later in the summer. A new{Martial Arts Club}has opened in Fleet for all ranges of ability. {Oxfam}thanked all those who knitted jumpers for people in Bangladesh. Fleet's most spectacular event of the year-the{Carnival-}will begin 6 July. The{Townswomen's Guild}raised Â£530, through a cabaret and buffet, for the Dhaka Hospital in India
